title: "What is the content of the mysterious book 'Furba Philosophorum' and other esoteric texts?"
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the authors delve into various topics related to esotericism, including the secret language of the "Fedeli d'Amore," solutions for rhythm and liberation, and the metaphysics of pain and illness. They also explore the role of initiation in the afterlife, the art of Hermetic philosophers, and the experience of the "double" and solar consciousness. Noteworthy contributions include "Noterelle sull'ascesi e sull'antieuropa" by Havismat and "Il demone delle nevi; Il canto dí gioia; Il canto dell'essenza delle cose" by Milarepa.
